name: Waluigi's Apartment
description:
In this experimental game, go into the personal life of Waluigi, the most powerful man in the world. Currently, the game just consists of his apartment, but I want to add gameplay and mechanics as I go along. 

PLEASE SUGGEST THINGS!

Anyway, I initially developed a crude prototype of this with my friend several years ago called Waluigi's Living Room, and decided to remake it now with CoolGraphics technology which has raytracing and stuff. If you're reading this, Will, hopefully this is up to your standards.

Also I should say all models are from https://poly.pizza/ and yes, I know that's a shitty half-citation, but I don't intend on monetizing this and I forget who made all the models. Thank you modelers. You are so cool and talented and I am not.

Anyway sorry if I fucked up the copyright laws and the federal government is currently closing in on my position.

CONTROLS:

WASD - move/strafe cause you know... it's a game

mouse - look around again you know the drill

mouse button - pick up objects (only certain objects are pick-uppable)
